title: Episode 50: Mary, Mary
itunes:title: Episode 50: Mary, Mary
description:
The Spiritualist movement placed a large focus on reaching beyond the veil, which made us the outsiders pressing into a foreign realm. In the late 1800’s, however, that realm pressed back, and what a wonder it turned out to be.

 

* * *

 

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

 

Audible: Audible content includes an unmatched selection of audiobooks, original audio shows, news, and more from the leading book, magazine, and newspaper publishers. Begin your free 30-day trial membership with a free book of your choice by visiting Audible.com/Lore. If you need a recommendation, check out my novel, Grave Suspicion.

The Great Courses Plus: Hundreds of topics taught by professors and experts, all in one enormous video library. Visit TheGreatCoursesPlus.com/lore to start your free one-month trial membership — and gain unlimited access to their entire lecture library, including my current favorite, Forensic History.

Casper: American-made, hybrid foam mattresses that are insanely comfortable. Visit Casper.com/Lore to get $50 off a mattress of your choice with the offer code LORE. Terms and Conditions Apply.
